entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
